backend/main.mo: Defines the Motoko canister actor with all user, training, belt, technique, and analytics-related types used by the backend.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records for promotion and smoke‑check tasks tied to Draft 137 with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of major frontend source files including components, hooks, pages, and dialogs.
frontend/DRAFT_127_REDEPLOY_ASSERTION.md: Documents a zero‑change quick redeploy for Draft 127 with verification checklist and deployment info fields.
frontend/DRAFT_128_REDEPLOY_ASSERTION.md: Records the zero‑change redeploy assertion for Draft 128 with purpose, status fields, and verification checklist.
frontend/DRAFT_132_REDEPLOY_ASSERTION.md: Asserts that Draft 132 is redeployed with no code, schema, or state changes for pipeline verification.
frontend/DRAFT_135_REDEPLOY_ASSERTION.md: Specifies that Draft 135 is a no‑changes redeploy from Draft 134 with deployment info and verification checklist.
frontend/DRAFT_137_REDEPLOY_ASSERTION.md: Declares Draft 137 as a production promotion with zero code changes and provides production‑focused verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_105.md: Documentation for a clean rebuild and redeploy of Draft 105 with no functional or schema changes, including pre‑rebuild checks.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_110.md: Outlines the clean rebuild/redeploy procedure for Draft 110 with pre‑deployment checklist and command sections.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_115.md: Tracks the clean rebuild and redeploy of Draft 115 with no code changes and includes pre‑deployment checks.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_125.md: Documents the clean rebuild and redeploy of Draft 125 with no modifications and includes pre‑deployment steps.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_127.md: Describes the clean rebuild and redeploy process for Draft 127 with confirmation of no changes.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_128.md: Records the rebuild/redeploy steps for Draft 128 ensuring zero source code changes and referencing the assertion doc.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_94.md: Provides rebuild and redeploy notes for Draft 94 with pre‑rebuild state and clean deployment steps.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_105.md: Redeploy note template for Draft 105 capturing deployment status, steps, and backend/frontend actions.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_110.md: Redeploy note for Draft 110 summarizing deployment targets, status, steps executed, and error reporting fields.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_115.md: Template for documenting Draft 115 redeploy details, steps taken, canister info, and any failures or errors.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_125.md: Draft 125 redeploy log template capturing deployment metadata, step statuses, canister IDs, and final outcome.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_127.md: Quick redeploy note for Draft 127 with sections for failure details, error locations, and verbatim output.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_128.md: Template for Draft 128 redeploy including context, steps, and placeholders for any failing step or errors.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_132.md: Minimal Draft 132 redeploy note with fields for timing, deployment type, and executed commands.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_135.md: Draft 135 redeploy record outlining intent, unchanged code, deployment steps, and final status.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_137.md: Draft 137 production promotion note documenting steps, unchanged code, and outcome placeholders.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_TEMPLATE.md: Generic template for redeploy notes covering target components, failure steps, locations, and error logs.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_105.md: Smoke test checklist for Draft 105 focusing on initial load and login screen verification.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_110.md: Draft 110 smoke check covering initial load validation and deployment environment details.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_115.md: Smoke test template for Draft 115 verifying application load and Internet Identity behavior.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_125.md: Draft 125 smoke check verifying initial load and capturing notes or console errors.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_127.md: Comprehensive smoke test for Draft 127 covering load, authentication, actor setup, dashboard, and profile flow.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_128.md: Draft 128 smoke check validating initial load, branding, login, and console conditions.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_135.md: Draft 135 smoke test covering load, authentication, dashboard behavior, and console/network errors.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_137.md: Production smoke test for Draft 137 validating full app flow from load to dashboard and tooltip functionality.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling identity login, actor initialization, profile loading, and routing to setup or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AddTechniqueDial: Dialog component for creating techniques with fields, tag management, and YouTube thumbnail generation.
frontend/src/components/AddTrainingDialo: Dialog for adding or editing training sessions, handling date selection, session details, and mood/intensity inputs.
frontend/src/components/Analytics.tsx: Empty component placeholder for analytics content.
frontend/src/components/BeltTracker.tsx: Tracks belt progress using user data, training history, and submissions, displaying gamified stats and completed stages.
frontend/src/components/CachedImage.tsx: Image component that preloads and caches images with fallback and loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/CompletedBeltSta: Displays preserved stats for a completed belt stage including progression, experience, and submission proficiency.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and link attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app branding, profile access, theme toggle, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen UI that triggers Internet Identity authentication and displays feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/Profile.tsx: Empty placeholder component; no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/ProfileAnalytics: Displays user profile analytics including sessions, submissions, streaks, and belt data using multiple hooks and computed metrics.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating or editing a user profile, including belt info, gym details, and profile picture upload.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionLogSec: Manages viewing and editing submission logs per belt level with duplicate handling and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionSelect: Searchable popover input for selecting submissions from predefined options while excluding existing ones.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionTagInp: Empty placeholder component; no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/TechniqueLibrary: Displays and filters a list of techniques by search and category, with UI to add new techniques.
Renders a year-based training heat map using local-time date mapping, theme-aware color updates, and month labels computed from weekly grids.
frontend/src/components/TrainingHoursHea: Displays an editable training-hours heat map with ISO weekday–aligned grids, color thresholds, and mutation hooks for updating stored hours.
frontend/src/components/TrainingLog.tsx: Provides the main training log UI with session creation, editing, analytics charts, and aggregated statistics.
frontend/src/components/TrainingMonthCal: Shows a scrollable month calendar with day-by-day session grouping, type-based coloring, and navigation between months.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWrapper.ts: Enhanced actor initialization hook that logs step-by-step auth and actor creation events and rebuilds the actor based on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDragToScroll.ts: Provides a hook enabling drag-to-scroll behavior via pointer events on a referenced element.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and training-related data via an actor wrapper.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, BJJ color utilities, and gradient animations.
frontend/src/lib/beltStatsCalculator.ts: Calculates belt progression, experience, submission proficiency, and mastery stats from training and submission data.
frontend/src/lib/beltUtils.ts: Provides helpers for belt image URLs, names, and preloading belt images.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Maps session theme enums to human-readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: Implements a simple in-memory image preload cache to prevent image flashing.
frontend/src/lib/intensityUtils.ts: Supplies intensity metadata, labels, badge colors, and numeric conversions for training intensity values.
frontend/src/lib/moodIcons.ts: Maps mood ratings to labels and colors and provides helpers to retrieve labels and hex colors.
frontend/src/lib/submissionLogUtils.ts: Utility functions for normalizing, finding, adding, removing, incrementing, decrementing, and merging BJJ submission entries.
frontend/src/lib/submissionOptions.ts: Exports a comprehensive alphabetical list of BJJ submission technique names and its type definition.
frontend/src/lib/submissionProficiencyTo: Defines tooltip text per belt level and a helper to retrieve the correct Submission Proficiency tooltip.
frontend/src/lib/submissionsListLoader.t: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/lib/trainingAnalytics.ts: Provides analytics utilities for sessions including themes, intensity, unique submissions, time bucketing, and roll averages.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides class name merging and date utilities plus heat‑map color logic and year grid generation using ISO weekday rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with tabbed navigation for analytics, training log, belt tracker, and techniques.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended layout/animation utilities, and typography/container-query/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s versioned state and lists existing app features, including authentication, actor initialization, admin token handling, debugging tools, RBAC, and React Query integration.
